title: (x) Looking for italics for Amplitude {Antonio Cavedoni}
content:
Hello everybody,

I have been searching for a font like whitney or amplitude, the problem is that these fonts don’t have the italics version.  
Does anybody know the italic font that appears on the image?

Thanks a lot!

comments.content: On Christian Schwartz’s site [he writes](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003405/http:/www.christianschwartz.com/amplitude.shtml): _Italics unofficially available for Normal width_.
